comments:

I cannot reproduce this, but it is possible that since we defer layouts, that 
they happen after the control has been diposed.

Eric -
make sure deferred updates don't happen once the control has been disposed(). 
Markt the update manager as disposed, and in performUpdate, do nothing if 
disposed. Call method from graphical viewers.
Please mark as duplicate of 24716.  I don't have access now that I assigned it.
